message.body: Hey Hannah :) Would it be cool with you if I threw a sheet over your bed and had a guest stay in your room for a couple nights? Please say no if it's not. They're in a bind and I said I'd ask...
Im going to be there tonight for sure...sorry..otherwise i wouldnt mind. But my beds super gross anyway<:)>
We have a couch in the living room dont we?
Ah this is actually next week or so. But no big. I can tell them they're out of luck. No couch I don't think... Apparently Lindsay took it?
Oh no if its next week its totally fine!
Yea? Well I'll just double check with you when it gets closer to see if plans change. Thanks Hannah, I appreciate it :)
